statements: SELECT * FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT username, email FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT id, username, email FROM sensitive_information WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT password FROM sensitive_information WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT id, username, email FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM sensitive_information WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE password <> '123456' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM sensitive_information WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM sensitive_information WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT id, name, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT encrypted_data, name, id FROM sensitive_data WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE name LIKE '%John%' OR name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT id, name FROM sensitive_data INNER JOIN encryption_keys ON sensitive_data.id = encryption_keys.key_id;
SELECT name, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM sensitive_data WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT id, phone_number FROM sensitive_data WHERE name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE email NOT LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT id, name, CONCAT('Email: ', email) AS contact_info FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT sd.id, ek.encryption_key, ed.encrypted_info FROM sensitive_data sd JOIN encryption_keys ek ON sd.id = ek.key_id JOIN encrypted_data ed ON sd.id = ed.id;
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM sensitive_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM sensitive_information WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, name, address FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) FROM users GROUP BY username HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY username;
SELECT id, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT setting_name, value FROM security_settings WHERE setting_name='encryption';
SELECT username, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, name, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT setting_name, value FROM security_settings WHERE setting_id = 1;
SELECT encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 2;
